about_the_game:
Welcome to "Goo Go"!


Control Goo using a triple jump and movement keys to overcome obstacles and climb higher and higher. This is a very challenging game that will test your skills, patience, and of course, your nerves.

Game Features:


– Challenging but not impossible gameplay. Persistence and practice will help you reach the top.

– Every obstacle is designed with intention and requires precision.
– Focused gameplay without distracting elements.
– You are immortal! But every mistake or haste will send you back to the very start.
– Jump, jump, slide, fall, and start over. And over, and over again.

– Tests of endurance and patience.

Note from the developer:
This game was created by one person — me. I was inspired by games like "Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy," "A Difficult Game About Climbing," and the first version of "Only Up!" These games are homages to the older game "Sexy Hiking" by Jazzuo. I have mixed feelings about such games: I both hate and love them at the same time. They burn neurons but also bring joy from achievements. I wanted to contribute to the "Foddian Type" genre and create not just a clone, but something unusual.

Good luck and patience!

Discord Community -
detailed_description:
Welcome to "Goo Go"!


Control Goo using a triple jump and movement keys to overcome obstacles and climb higher and higher. This is a very challenging game that will test your skills, patience, and of course, your nerves.

Game Features:


– Challenging but not impossible gameplay. Persistence and practice will help you reach the top.

– Every obstacle is designed with intention and requires precision.
– Focused gameplay without distracting elements.
– You are immortal! But every mistake or haste will send you back to the very start.
– Jump, jump, slide, fall, and start over. And over, and over again.

– Tests of endurance and patience.

Note from the developer:
This game was created by one person — me. I was inspired by games like "Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy," "A Difficult Game About Climbing," and the first version of "Only Up!" These games are homages to the older game "Sexy Hiking" by Jazzuo. I have mixed feelings about such games: I both hate and love them at the same time. They burn neurons but also bring joy from achievements. I wanted to contribute to the "Foddian Type" genre and create not just a clone, but something unusual.

Good luck and patience!

name: Goo Go

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 11
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Test your skills, patience, and nerves in a game where one mistake will send you back to the beginning. Oh, and welcome to "Goo Go"!
